name: Kwanzoo
tag_list: b2b-lead-generation, conference-marketing, polls-in-email, social-sharing, b2b-email-marketing, lead-nurturing, demand-generation, lead-generation, online-marketing, social-media-marketing, referral-marketing, social-marketing, direct-marketing, email-mar
overview: Kwanzoo (http://www.kwanzoo.com) provides a SaaS-based multi-channel marketing platform for B2B, B2C and Event marketers to design and deploy highly engaging, multi-channel campaigns. Kwanzoo’s smart marketing units (polls, surveys, social promotions and opt-in lead forms) improve demand generation; enhance lead nurturing and grow word-of-mouth mentions and sales. Kwanzoo campaigns run on mobile (iPhone, Android), inside email, on websites, Facebook pages, LinkedIn, affiliate sites, paid media & re-targeting channels. Kwanzoo uses commodity Linux servers and Amazonâ€™s AWS cloud infrastructure to scale easily, and serve millions of campaign impressions for demanding enterprise customers. Clients include SAP, Real Networks, Online Marketing Summit (OMS), Proofpoint and UBM TechWeb.

milestones.description: Kwanzoo launches new online marketing service in private beta at Adtech-New York.
milestones.source_description: Kwanzoo: Instant Landing Pages for Social Media Marketers [Invites]
